name: es5-lit-html
description: An ES5 transpiled version of lit-html
author: Wes Todd <wes@wesleytodd.com>

scripts.syncversion: npm ls lit-html | grep ' lit-html@' | sed -e 's/^.*@//' | xargs npm version
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel --no-babelrc --presets=@babel/preset-env node_modules/lit-html/lib -d lib && babel --no-babelrc --presets=@babel/preset-env node_modules/lit-html/lit-html.js -d . && babel --no-babelrc --presets=@babel/preset-env node_modules/lit-html/directives -d directives
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run syncversion
scripts.postpublish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
